en: No! But you deny the Recompense.
And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
And never therefrom will they be absent.
And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

ar: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَىكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
en: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا
en: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing;
and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
